thread.title: Sterling extends slide as Carney punctures rate hike bets

title: Sterling extends slide as Carney punctures rate hike bets
text:
Sterling extends slide as Carney punctures rate hike bets 8:09am EDT - 01:47 
Britain's pound has been knocked off its recent strong gains by comments from Bank of England governor, Mark Carney, that undermine expectations a UK rate hike in May. As David Pollard reports, sterling was down 1.35 percent for the week.
